issue.title: [C++] Allow FileSystem::DeleteDirContents to succeed if the directory is missing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16159](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16159). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently DeleteDirContents fails if the directory is missing.  This can lead to issues with filesystems that don't support empty directories (see ARROW-12358) and it is the behavior desired by the datasets API.  We should be able to ignore missing directories.
